posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.text: mysql æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥æ•°é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†â€œCan not connect to MySQL server. Too many connectionsâ€-mysql 1040 è‹¥å¯¹è¿æ¥æ•°æ— è¦æ±‚å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥é‡å¯æ•°æ®åº“ï¼› systemctl restart mysqld; æ°¸ä¹…ä¿®æ”¹æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥æ•°ï¼šä¿®æ”¹my.cnfä¸­çš„max_connectionsï¼Œå¹¶é‡å¯mysql ä¸´æ—¶ä¿®æ”¹æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥æ•°ï¼š æŸ¥çœ‹ï¼šshow variables like '%max_connections%'; ä¿®æ”¹ï¼šset GLOBAL max_connections = 1000; è‹¥éœ€è¦æ’æŸ¥åŸå› ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç™»é™†ä¸è¿›å»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨gdbæŒ‡ä»¤ä¿®æ”¹è¿›ç¨‹ä¸­çš„å‚æ•°ï¼š gdb -p ${/home/mysql/mysql.pid} -ex "set max_connections=1000" -batch ä¾¿å¯è¿è¿›å»ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹å½“å‰è¿æ¥ï¼š SHOW PROCESSLIST;
